action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

sudo curl -o nutanix-neo-1-1.3.0.x86_64.rpm @@{PLUGIN_DOWNLOAD_URL}@@
sudo yum install -y nutanix-neo-1-1.3.0.x86_64.rpm

sudo sed -i '/\[NEO\]/,+2 s/ip.*/ip=127.0.0.1/' /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg
sudo sed -i '/\[PRISM\]/,+2 s/ip.*/ip=@@{PRISM_VIRTUAL_IP}@@/' /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg
sudo sed -i '/\[PRISM\]/,+1 s/username.*/username=@@{PRISM_USERNAME}@@/' /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg
sudo sed -i '/\[PRISM\]/,+3 s/password.*/password=@@{PRISM_PASSWORD}@@/' /opt/nutanix-neo/config/nutanix-neo-plugin.cfg

sudo service nutanix-neo restart

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create
